title: Excellent PM coaching
content: Sarah was incredibly insightful and supportive. Her real-world examples from Google made complex concepts easy to understand. I left the session feeling more confident and inspired.

title: Great mentor for PMs
content: As a current PM looking to level up, Sarah's insights were invaluable. She helped me identify gaps in my strategy thinking and provided actionable frameworks.

title: Outstanding case prep
content: Marcus helped me master the case interview format with structured frameworks and real McKinsey cases. His feedback was detailed and constructive.

title: Medical school application expert
content: Dr. Rodriguez guided me through every step of the medical school application process. Her insider knowledge of admissions committees was incredibly valuable.

title: Funny and insightful
content: Alex taught me the fundamentals of joke structure and stage presence. The open mic preparation was especially helpful for getting over stage fright.

title: Career transformation success
content: David's full-stack program completely changed my career trajectory. The hands-on projects and interview prep were exactly what I needed to land my first tech job.
